document_data.name: ''Eye of Ranman''
document_data.mainbody: The ''Eye of Ranman'' was a magical [[amulet]] intended for a [[monk]]'s use only. This item was a part of the set of magic items of the ''[[Ranman's Meditations]]''.
document_data.Description: The ''Eye of Ranman'' was a heavy deep green crystal on a chain.
document_data.Powers: Along with other artifacts of Ranman's, the ''Eye of Ranman'' was usable only by monks and granted the wearer wisdom, along with increased movement speed that exceeded that of an average humanoid.
document_data.History: The ''Eye of Ranman'' belonged to the dwarves of [[Harldain Ironbar]]'s [[House of Gems]]. ''Circa'' [[1369 DR]], the amulet could be found in the Room of Words of the House of Gems in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]].
